p: The desirability function was used to determine the optimum setting of the reaction conditions that led to the highest response level [ 25]. The optimisation algorithm allowed the elaboration of the profiles for predicted response values and desirability functions ( Figure 2). The red vertical lines shown in the upper three rows of curves in Figure 2 indicate the maximal individual desirability relative to extraction yield, while those in the bottom row show the maximum global desirability.
